T02TD2990E:54a-0: @54a * // dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2990E:54a-1: lha ma yin gyi gdon las thar bar 'dod pas /
T02TD2990E:54a-2: sngon du dus dang mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T02TD2990E:54a-4: lus che la yon tan can la lha ma yin gyi gdon tshes lnga la 'jug go //
T02TD2990E:54b-0: zhugs @54b pa'i mtshan ma ni du zhing res dgod /
T02TD2990E:54b-3: rgod pa drag por byed do //
T02TD2990E:54b-4: de las thar ba'i thabs ni gtor ma ni spos dang /
T02TD2990E:54b-5: me tog sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02TD2990E:54b-10: sngags pas gtsang sbra byas te /
T02TD2990E:54b-11: nub phyogs su gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD2990E:54b-12: de nas nad pa khrus byas la 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum dang pu shel tse dang /
T02TD2990E:54b-13: rtsa ba lnga rnams cha bsnyams la mar phul bzhi dang ba'i gcin phul bzhi me chung bas dal gyis btso'o //
T02TD2990E:54b-14: de nas khrus byas dal gyis btab pa snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02TD2990E:54b-15: lha ma yin gyi gdon las thar bar nges so //
T02TD2990E:54b-16: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
